# 33rd Bachsas Awards

The 33rd Bachsas Awards were given by Bangladesh Cholochitra Sangbadik Samity (Bangladesh Cine-Journalists' Association) to outstanding performers of the silver screen, small screen, music, dance and theatre in 2011. Awards was introduced in 1972 to encourage the fledgling film industry of the country.
